1. Food-makers are phasing out artificial dyes. The problem: Americans love the color  NPR
  2. Removing FD&C colors from our portfolio  The Campbell's Company
  3. Campbell’s becomes latest food giant to remove synthetic colors  Food Dive
  4. Your Favorite Campbell’s Products Are Getting a Big Change Soon—Here’s What You Need to Know  yahoo.com
  5. Campbell’s Company to End Use of Synthetic Food Dyes  Food Safety Magazine
